inclusion.criterion: Adults, male or female, age 18 to 65 years.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Newly diagnosed sputum smear-positive pulmonary tuberculosis as confirmed by sputum acid fast bacilli (AFB) smear and chest X-ray findings consistent with pulmonary tuberculosis.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing and able to provide informed consent.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Reasonably normal hemoglobin (greater than or equal to 8 gm/dL), renal function (serum creatinine less than 2 mg/dL), hepatic function [serum aspartate aminotransferase (AST) less than 1.5 times the upper limit of normal for the testing laboratory and total bilirubin less than 1.3 mg/dL], and random blood glucose less than 150 mg/dL.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Presence of significant hemoptysis. Patients who cough up frank blood (more than blood streaked sputum) will not be eligible for enrollment.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient A is a 30-year-old male with newly diagnosed pulmonary tuberculosis, willing to provide informed consent and meets the inclusion criteria. However, there is no indication of HIV infection or significant hemoptysis.
